House Bill/Resolution NO. PS00068
FULL TITLE : HUMAN RIGHTS OF FARMERS
SHORT TITLE : 44th Anniversary Of The Declaration Of Martial Law
ABSTRACT : ... Rep. Casilao spoke on the issue of human rights violations particularly on the political and extrajudicial killings of farmers, farmworkers, lumads and indigenous peoples (IPs). He stated that such killings are reminiscent of the martial law era and that the farmers and farmworkers still continue to experience such kind of abuse to date...; expressed support on the ongoing formal peace talks between the National Democratic Front of the Philippines (NDFP) and the government,...; urged his colleagues to join the clamor for the release of some 500 political prisoners and to support House Resolution No.198 filed by the Makabayan Coalition seeking the release of political prisoners...; emphasized the right of farmers to labor on their land in peace, without threat and intimidation, and called for justice for the continuing atrocities of the military against the marginalized sector.(SOURCE: House Journal No. 22,p.11)
